title: The Blade of Frontiers
content:
l be able to say that his father is not dead yet.

Your father's not dead yet, Wyll. Maybe there's a way to save him. What's out next step then? I'd like to talk about something else. Leave.

Check the ambushers' possessions.

If you severed the Pack and the Grand Duke died

Counsellor Florrick/Cordula Eltan and her allies ambushed us, accusing Wyll of killing his father so he could take over the city. We defeated them after Florrick refused to stand down; we should check their possessions for a
